EmailTemplate.name: EM-202308-HHS-ENT-Annual-Survey-Follow-up-Promo.Email 1 w/Hero Asset
EmailTemplate.subject: Survey says…now’s the time to expand virtual care
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What’s next in virtual care The Telehealth Benchmark Survey is a guidepost that shows how far virtual care has come and where it’s going. Our infographic captures key insights from the survey report <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/white-paper/annual-telehealth-benchmark-survey-report/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=202308-HHS-ENT-Annual-Survey-Follow-up-Promo&utm_campaign_id=/]]> that will help inform your virtual care strategy going forward, including: • 84% of health systems have virtual programs in place • 61% of health system executives want to expand their virtual offerings this year • Virtual nursing is now the highest growth area for new telehealth services
• And much more About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
